mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board (board_num, board_title, board_writer, board_content) VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{board_title}, #{board_writer}, #{board_content})
mapper.select: SELECT board_num, board_title, board_writer, board_content, board_viewcount, board_date FROM tbl_board WHERE board_num = #{board_num}
SELECT board_num, board_title, board_writer, board_viewcount, board_date FROM tbl_board WHERE board_num > 0 ORDER BY board_num DESC, board_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET board_viewcount = board_viewcount + 1 WHERE board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, board_num, board_title, board_writer, board_viewcount,board_date FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_board ORDER BY board_num DESC)) WHERE rnum >= #{startCount} AND rnum <= #{endCount}
